title: Conditions for optimality in the infinite-horizon portfolio-cum-saving problem with semimartingale investments
abstract: A model of optimal accumulation of capital and portfolio choice over an infinite horizon in continuous time is formulated in which the vector process representing returns to investments isa general semimartingale.
